title: I take shampoo from hotels I stay at. Especially from attached shampoo bottles.
body:
If I stay at a hotel with the those mini shampoo bottles, yes I’ll take those…  But what really tickles my fancy is when hotels have those attached shampoo bottles, I’ll get an empty plastic water bottle and fill up the bottle to take home.

I haven’t purchased shampoo for myself in over 5 years because I have an overwhelming amount of hotel shampoo.

Edit: well…didn’t expect this post to gain so much traction. I got a lot of responses asking if I wanted congratulations?  No?  I’m in r/confession, not looking for any praise.  Also….so many of yall think I book hotels just for taking their shampoo….no.  I don’t book hotels for shampoo, I take shampoo IF I happen to stay at a hotel (which was 8 different times this year, if you needed to know)

A lot of yall have addressed the cheapness of my action and calling me a a$$hole a few times.  This is /r/confession, this isn’t r/aitha.  So for those of yall who want to call people out on that, you should go to the appropriate subreddit.  I can afford shampoo, I just wanted to confess I have a weird nack for taking shampoo from hotels.  I know hotel shampoo is cheap, but hyatts (the hotels I stay the most at) are one of the better shampoos imo.

But yeah, some of yall should check which subreddit you’re in and get off your high horse. 🐎
author: cheesypuff357
